title: Apify Actor Input Schema
description: Schema for the input data of an Apify Actor for scraping tweets based on various criteria.

searchQueries.description: List of search queries to use for finding tweets. Use the 'near' parameter to search near a location.

tweetsDesired.description: Maximum number of tweets to scrape per query.

repliesDepth.description: Levels of replies to scrape. 0 for no replies, 1 for the tweet and its replies, etc.

includeUserId.description: Include user ID in the tweet result. Useful for identifying the profile of each tweet.

since.description: Oldest date of tweets to extract. Use relative ('1 month', '2 days') or absolute ('2020-02-29') dates.

until.description: Newest date of tweets to extract. Use relative or absolute dates.

minReplies.description: Minimum number of replies a tweet must have to be scraped.

minRetweets.description: Minimum number of retweets a tweet must have to be scraped.

minLikes.description: Minimum number of likes a tweet must have to be scraped.

fromTheseAccounts.description: Scrape tweets specifically from these accounts.

toTheseAccounts.description: Scrape tweets sent to these accounts.

mentioningTheseAccounts.description: Scrape tweets that mention these accounts.

nativeRetweets.description: Include only native retweets (retweeted without comment).

media.description: Include only tweets that contain media like images, videos, gifs, etc.

images.description: Include only tweets that contain images.

videos.description: Include only tweets that contain videos.

news.description: Include only tweets that contain news.

verified.description: Include only tweets from verified users.

nativeVideo.description: Include only tweets that contain native video.

links.description: Include only tweets that contain links.

safe.description: Include only tweets marked as potentially sensitive.

quote.description: Include only tweets that quote other tweets.

proVideo.description: Include only tweets that contain pro video.

excludeNativeRetweets.description: Exclude native retweets from the results.

excludeSafe.description: Exclude tweets marked as potentially sensitive.

excludeQuote.description: Exclude tweets that quote other tweets.

language.description: Language in which tweets are written. Use the provided options.
